educations.desc: Went to Yonsei University Graduate School of Engineering (GSE) to develop professionalism. Was able to learn about algorithms, 3d graphics, app platform design, databases, artificial intelligence, and etc.
Went to university to get bachelor's degree. It was an opportunity to learn Java, design, PHP, and more.

Wanted to become a developer, so I went to a college where I could learn more about practical work. Was able to experience various programming languages such as Java, .NET, C#, HTML, JQuery, SQL, and Android.

experiences.desc: Web development and maintenance of magazine sites in 8 fields including mortgage, insurance, HR, safety, education, consumer, law and wealth.
Web development for intranet and customer insurance claims. Customize based on customer requirements and business' needs. Supported for branch offices in Asia Pacific.
Web development of groupware solutions, in charge of mail, address book, and schedule management modules. Customize based on customer requirements.

projects.name: Lexpert
projects.skills: .NET 5, HTML, JavaScript, Microsoft SQL Server, SCSS
projects.desc: A renewal project that analyzes and redesign the structure of the lexpert.ca site, which was previously developed based on the .NET Web Forms framework, and then develops it based on the latest framework, .NET 5 Razor Pages.
